snippet.title: Pegasus ][ for the Apple II
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

In Pegasus ][ you are steering a spaceship, with which you must avoid rockets that launch, and different flying enemies. 

But you can also shoot and throw bombs.


What I think:

Okay game....reminds me of another game.

Which one was it again?

Oh, right! SCRAMBLE !!!
